alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:04AM CDT until July 14 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN...EASTERN DALLAM AND NORTHEASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 202 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Dalhart, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment at Dalhart airport reported 60 mph wind gust at 1:52 AM CDT. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
